QuestData.Title: If Valgarde Falls...
QuestData.Description: If Valgarde falls, our primary supply line into Northrend will cease to exist. From there it'll only be a matter of time before we're all servants of the Lich King. Now I don't know about you, but I've got a wife and three kids back in Elwynn and I'll be damned if I'll go down without a fight.$B$BThe situation here is critical and we can use all the manpower you're able to muster. Get to the front gate and help the guards defend the city against the invading monsters!
QuestData.LogDescription: Vice Admiral Keller at Valgarde Port in the Howling Fjord wants you to slay 12 Dragonflayer Invaders or Dragonflayer Worgs.
QuestData.CompletionText: The fate of the world may very well rest with us.
QuestData.RewardText: You gave our defenders the extra support they needed, $n. Morale is higher than ever now, thanks to you. I think they'll be able to handle the remaining onslaught on their own. I've got bigger plans for you...
